desc: MUMZY’S COFFE IS A STUNNING, ULTRA SMOOTH, COMPLEX YET PERFECTLY BALANCED AROMA AND TASTE IS ONE OF THE FINEST YOU WILL EVER TASTE! • Origin: Cameroon, Volcanic • Altitude: 3,600 to 7,200 feet above sea level • Varieties: 100% Arabica & 100% Robusta • Roast degree: Medium • Gluten free • Trans-fat free • Non-GMO

layout.text: WELCOME TO MUMZY’S COFFEE! YOU’VE JUST STUMBLED UPON THE HOLY GRAIL! GET READY TO HAVE YOUR MIND BLOWN WITH THE MOST STUNNING 100% ARABICA FROM CAMEROON 🇨🇲
ALL PROFITS GO TO IL501C3 CHARITY MUMZY’S CHILDREN RELIEF FOUNDATION TO FIGHT HUNGER & ILLITERACY & PROVIDE CLEAN WATER TO THE EXTREMELY POOR.
